page.title: 17A FARMWORKER'S DAY
page.content:
{MR.GREARSON}MOVED FROM LONDON AND HAS BEEN A DAIRYMAN FOR 25YRS.HE HAS BEEN DAIRYMAN AT RAWSTON FARM FOR 10YRS. HE MILKS 95 COWS,FEEDS THE CALVES & IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE MILK & BREEDING PROGRAMME.HE GETS UP AT 4.15 AM.,HAS BREAKFAST AT 8AM.,WORKS FROM 9.30 TO 12.30 &1.30 TO 4.30PM.HE HAS A DAY OFF EVERY WEEK & 3 DAYS OFF EVERY MONTH. { MR.GREARSON}LIKES WORKING WITH ANIMALS,BUT DOESN'T LIKE GETTING UP AT 4.15 AM! HE LIKES LIVING IN RAWSTON BUT SAYS HIS CHILDREN HAVE NO FRIENDS WHO LIVE NEAR. { MR GREARSON}SHOWED US A BLIND CALF.HE KEPT IT IN A PEN WITH TWO OTHER BIGGER CALVES. IN HIS SPARE TIME{MR.GREARSON}PLAYS A LOT OF CRICKET WITH HIS SON,JUSTIN.
{BEVERLEY,SARAH,SHARON &JENNIFER.
